short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage your bookmarks with tags instead of folders

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DaiDai is a useful and easy-to-use chrome extension that helps users manage their bookmarks in a streamlined and organized way. With DaiDai, users can tag their bookmarks with relevant keywords, making it easy to quickly locate saved websites and information.

Gone are the days of traditional bookmark folders, as DaiDai allows users to categorize their bookmarks through tags. This new method of bookmark organization saves time and promotes efficiency, as users no longer need to sift through multiple folders to find a saved web page.

DaiDai also allows for rich-text editing and deletion of bookmarks, giving users complete control over their saved content. The extension's sleek and user-friendly interface ensures that users can quickly and intuitively navigate the tool.
